text_tunnels.config.name: Text Tunnels Settings
text_tunnels.config.main.name: Main settings
text_tunnels.config.main.enabled.@Toolti: Toggle all the feature of this mod on and off
text_tunnels.config.main.buttonStyle.hei: The space above the text input
text_tunnels.config.main.buttonStyle.fan: Switch the buttons to be in keeping with the chat background
text_tunnels.config.main.unreadIndicator: Show indicator when there is an unread message in chanel
The Size the indicator should be
The icon used for the indicator
text_tunnels.config.serverConfig.enabled: Toggle Text Tunnels for this server
text_tunnels.config.tunnelConfig.name: Tunnel Config
text_tunnels.config.tunnelConfig.configL: Are you sure you want to delete this tunnel?
Tunnel '%s' will be lost forever! (A long time!)
text_tunnels.config.tunnelConfig.reciveP: Input text to filter received message (this is a regex pattern which parts can be used in the send prefix)
text_tunnels.config.tunnelConfig.sendPre: Input text to add to messages sent in this tunnel. (use "$number" to reference a group in the receive prefix)
Invalid Recive Prefix. Fix regex to finish
text_tunnels.messageReceiveHandler.error: [TextTunnels] Invalid regex for message: %s. Can't load tunnels until fixed
text_tunnels.MessageSendHandler.error: [TextTunnels] Can't get group %s out of %s groups (need to fix your config)
